choices.label: It is Verresâ€™ dear friend who is able to accuse Verres anytime
Verres has a dear friend who accuses Verres anytime he can and wants
He who can accuse Verres anytime he wants will be dear to Verres
Verres will be loved because Verres is able to accuse himself anytime he wants

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
